meanings.definition: The position or role of a manager.
meanings.sent1: Her managership at the store involves overseeing the daily operations.
meanings.sent2: In the company, managership requires making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: His managership of the team is like being the captain of a ship.
meanings.sent4: The managership of the project was compared to conducting an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The managership of the hotel was so efficient that guests always felt welcome.

meanings.definition: The skill or ability to manage effectively.
meanings.sent1: With her natural managership, she easily delegates tasks to the team.
meanings.sent2: Improving your managership can lead to better outcomes in projects.
meanings.sent3: His managership in handling chaos is truly impressive.
meanings.sent4: The managership she displayed in crisis situations was remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The managership of the chef in the kitchen ensured smooth service during busy hours.
